settings.contact: w-full dark:bg-gray-900 dark:text-white py-10 text-center mx-auto
settings.contact__style--form: mt-5 md:mt-7 w-full mx-auto px-6 md:w-3/5
settings.contact__style--input: w-full px-2 py-1 text-sm md:text-base border rounded-md bg-gray-50 dark:bg-gray-700 dark:border-gray-600 dark:placeholder-gray-400 dark:text-white dark:focus:ring-primary-500 dark:focus:border-primary-500
settings.contact__style--textarea: w-full px-2 py-1 text-sm md:text-base border rounded-md bg-gray-50 dark:bg-gray-700 dark:border-gray-600 dark:placeholder-gray-400 dark:text-white dark:focus:ring-primary-500 dark:focus:border-primary-500
settings.contact__submit-button: py-1 px-2 block mx-auto md:py-3 md:px-5 md:w-full text-sm font-medium text-center bg-blue-600 text-white rounded-md border cursor-pointer bg-primary-700 border-primary-600 hover:bg-blue-800 focus:ring-4 focus:ring-primary-300 dark:bg-primary-600 dark:hover:bg-primary-700 dark:focus:ring-primary-800

settings.title: Discover Our Beautiful Bouquets
settings.description: Explore our collection of exquisite bouquets and surprise your loved ones with the perfect gift. Click the button below to start shopping.
settings.shop-promo: flex flex-col gap-8 px-4 py-10 border-brand-black border-y text-center items-center md:p-20 md:gap-10
settings.shop-promo__button: text-mobile-button font-medium uppercase flex gap-3 items-center justify-center bg-black text-white border-brand-black hover:bg-transparent hover:text-black border transition fade duration 300 ease-out h-[46px] w-[270px] md:text-desktop-button tracking-[0.025em] md:tracking-[0.03em] md:h-[56px]
